issue.title: Failure to compile 2x in a row

content.raw: The problem happens if you try to `make -j8` (without sudo) after having done `sudo make install`. Any idea why that happens, @nkoenig ?
content.html: The problem happens if you try to make -j8 (without sudo) after having done sudo make install. Any idea why that happens, @nkoenig ?

issue.title: Failure to compile 2x in a row

content.raw: What does the output of `make VERBOSE=1` look like?
content.html: What does the output of make VERBOSE=1 look like?

issue.title: Failure to compile 2x in a row

content.raw:
From a clean workspace:

~~~
cmake ..
~~~

~~~
$ make -j8 VERBOSE=1 | grep doc
make -f doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/depend
cd /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build && /usr/bin/cmake -E cmake_depends "Unix Makefiles" /home/louise/code/ign-gui /home/louise/code/ign-gui/doc /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/DependInfo.cmake --color=
Dependee "/home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/DependInfo.cmake" is newer than depender "/home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/depend.internal".
Dependee "/home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/CMakeDirectoryInformation.cmake" is newer than depender "/home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/depend.internal".
Scanning dependencies of target doc
make -f doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build
[  2%] Generating API documentation with Doxygen
cp /home/louise/code/ign-gui/doc/ignition_logo.svg /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doxygen/html
[ 29%] Built target doc
~~~

~~~
$ sudo make install VERBOSE=1 | grep doc
make -f doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/depend
cd /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build && /usr/bin/cmake -E cmake_depends "Unix Makefiles" /home/louise/code/ign-gui /home/louise/code/ign-gui/doc /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/DependInfo.cmake --color=
make -f doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build
[  1%] Generating API documentation with Doxygen
cp /home/louise/code/ign-gui/doc/ignition_logo.svg /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doxygen/html
[  1%] Built target doc
~~~

~~~
$ make -j8 VERBOSE=1 | grep doc
make -f doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/depend
cd /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build && /usr/bin/cmake -E cmake_depends "Unix Makefiles" /home/louise/code/ign-gui /home/louise/code/ign-gui/doc /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/DependInfo.cmake --color=
make -f doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build
[  3%] Generating API documentation with Doxygen
make[2]: *** [doc/CMakeFiles/doc] Error 1
doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make:57: recipe for target 'doc/CMakeFiles/doc' failed
make[1]: *** [doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/all] Error 2
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:149: recipe for target 'doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
~~~

I tried commenting out the `cp ... logo.svg` but it didn't solve the issue.
content.html:
From a clean workspace:

cmake ..

$ make -j8 VERBOSE=1 | grep doc
make -f doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/depend
cd /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build && /usr/bin/cmake -E cmake_depends "Unix Makefiles" /home/louise/code/ign-gui /home/louise/code/ign-gui/doc /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/DependInfo.cmake --color=
Dependee "/home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/DependInfo.cmake" is newer than depender "/home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/depend.internal".
Dependee "/home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/CMakeDirectoryInformation.cmake" is newer than depender "/home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/depend.internal".
Scanning dependencies of target doc
make -f doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build
[  2%] Generating API documentation with Doxygen
cp /home/louise/code/ign-gui/doc/ignition_logo.svg /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doxygen/html
[ 29%] Built target doc

$ sudo make install VERBOSE=1 | grep doc
make -f doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/depend
cd /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build && /usr/bin/cmake -E cmake_depends "Unix Makefiles" /home/louise/code/ign-gui /home/louise/code/ign-gui/doc /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/DependInfo.cmake --color=
make -f doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build
[  1%] Generating API documentation with Doxygen
cp /home/louise/code/ign-gui/doc/ignition_logo.svg /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doxygen/html
[  1%] Built target doc

$ make -j8 VERBOSE=1 | grep doc
make -f doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/depend
cd /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build && /usr/bin/cmake -E cmake_depends "Unix Makefiles" /home/louise/code/ign-gui /home/louise/code/ign-gui/doc /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc /home/louise/code/ign-gui/build/doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/DependInfo.cmake --color=
make -f doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build
[  3%] Generating API documentation with Doxygen
make[2]: *** [doc/CMakeFiles/doc] Error 1
doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/build.make:57: recipe for target 'doc/CMakeFiles/doc' failed
make[1]: *** [doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/all] Error 2
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:149: recipe for target 'doc/CMakeFiles/doc.dir/all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

I tried commenting out the cp ... logo.svg but it didn't solve the issue.

issue.title: Failure to compile 2x in a row

content.raw: I've been testing with the `doc` branch on ign-gui, and can't seem to reproduce this problem. Can you try with that branch?
content.html: I've been testing with the doc branch on ign-gui, and can't seem to reproduce this problem. Can you try with that branch?

issue.title: Failure to compile 2x in a row

content.raw: That branch is not building against the current ign-common default, is it ok to merge default into it?
content.html: That branch is not building against the current ign-common default, is it ok to merge default into it?

issue.title: Failure to compile 2x in a row

content.raw: Just tested the `doc` branch and the problem is fixed there. I'll close this issue once pull request #68 is merged. It will take a while because it needs ign-cmake.
content.html: Just tested the doc branch and the problem is fixed there. I'll close this issue once pull request #68 is merged. It will take a while because it needs ign-cmake.
